content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for considering my apartment. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains, so I am open to discussing a rental price that reflects the value of the apartment. What is your budget for a rental in this area?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is x Euros per month, but I am open to negotiating the price. What is your proposal?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your flexibility, Hassan. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would propose a rental price of €1000 per month. This price reflects the market rate for similar apartments in this area and would provide me with a reasonable return on my investment. However, I am open to discussing a lower price if you have a specific budget in mind. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can accept the price of 1000 Euros per month. I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month. TERMINATE.

Thank you for your time, Mister Heine.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: You're welcome, Hassan. I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. If you have any questions or need any additional information, please don't hesitate to reach out.
name: Heinrich Heine
